channel.title: Berserk Village Recruiting
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Berserk Village Recruiting" - Looking for players

item.title: Berserk Village Recruiting
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I just created Berserk Village and we welcome every player, we offer help over the game and items (permanents and non) , just ask on the village page and I'll help you out.

thanks
Matsukaze
